alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Niagara; Orleans (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 7:31PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ORLEANS...MONROE...AND NIAGARA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow along an arctic cold front will move onshore along the entire south shore of Lake Ontario this evening, producing a quick burst of heavy snow. Visibility will abruptly drop to less than a half mile, and roads will rapidly become snow covered and slippery. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...The band of heavy lake effect snow over Lake Ontario will move south and onshore in Niagara, Orleans, and Monroe counties between 745 PM and 845 PM. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Rochester, Lockport, Brockport, Medina, Albion, Hilton, Newfane, Spencerport, Lewiston, Youngstown, Middleport, Holley and Lyndonville. SAFETY INFO... Be prepared for rapidly changing conditions with a sudden drop in visibility and deteriorating road conditions. &&
